name: Bridgey
description:
Game made for gdevelop game jam about bridge building

How To Play

left mouse click to build

press w to create a path 

and press s to create a barrier for the path

press 1-4 to change the material and the more expensive the material the more people pass by and the more money you get

press right and left to set hold length

press a and d to set the angle

right mouse click to destroy roads and barriers (not get money back)

press SPACEBAR to destroy all roads and barriers(get money back)

press return to open bridge 

and press Rshift to close it
